In the event that leadership should leave the organization, the incoming individual will assume responsibility for the BPCI Advanced Model. Should the leadership change without a replacement planned the Vice-President will assign the duties of BPCI Advanced Model to another employee at that time.
Working with the CHF bundled has brought healthcare workers all over the organization together to work on a shared goal.
LOS, re-admits and discharge location are very closely monitored; as well as, patient outcomes at the end of episode of care.
